name: Lemi plush 30" (blue) (price incl shipping around the world)
description:
Standing at close to 30 inches tall, this mega-plush dolls are HAND MADE. Sticker, postcards, and pins will be included in every purchase. This original edition is available for all.

Designed by Thunderpanda, produced and published by Plastic Culture, this supersized plush is limited to 75 pieces worldwide.

* price are shipping inclusive around the world
* in some case, our store might run out of stock. we will refund your money for that case.
* will ship in 2-3 working days after order received.
* we ship using registered and tracked airmail, will arrive in 1-2 weeks.
* also available express delivery services
* please note if you want me to add signature.
